channel.title: CVE Feed for matter-labs -- era-compiler-vyper
channel.description: The latest CVEs for matter-labs -- era-compiler-vyper

item.title: CVE-2024-38533|2024-07-02T20:45:48.581Z -- matter-labs -- era-compiler-vyper
item.description: ZKsync Era is a layer 2 rollup that uses zero-knowledge proofs to scale Ethereum. There is possible invalid stack access due to the addresses used to access the stack not properly being converted to cells. This issue has been patched in version 1.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-38533|2024-06-28T21:18:30.547Z -- matter-labs -- era-compiler-vyper
